name: Vona
title: Vona
description: A Node.js full-stack framework with workflow engine
author: zhennann

scripts.init: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && npm run prerun && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile
scripts.db:reset: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:dbReset -- --flavor=normal
scripts.dev: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:dev -- --workers=2 --flavor=normal
scripts.dev:one: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:dev -- --workers=1 --flavor=normal
scripts.test: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:test -- --flavor=normal
scripts.cov: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:test -- --coverage --flavor=normal
scripts.tsc: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:tsc
scripts.build: npm run prerun && npm run vona :bin:build -- --flavor=normal
